titles.title: 109 Behold Where In A Mortal Form

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
behold here in a mortal form
appears each grace divine
the virtues all in jesus met
with mildest radiance shine

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
to spread the rays of heavenly light
to give the mourner joy
to preach glad tidings to the poor
was His divine employ

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
'Mid keen reproach and cruel scorn
patient and meek He stood
his foes ungrateful sought His life
he labored for their good

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
in the last hour of deep distress
before His Father's throne
with sould resigned He bowed and said
Thy will not mine be done

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
be christ our pattern and our guide
his image may be bear
oh may we tread His holy steps
his joy and glory share
